directions.step:
1. CHOP APPLES INTO 1/2 INCH PIECES.
2. MIX TOGETHER CINNAMON, FLOUR, MACE AND SUGAR.
3. ADD TO APPLES; MIX WELL.
NOTE: 1. THIS FILLING MAY BE USED IN A VARIETY OF SWEET DOUGH PRODUCTS. SEE RECIPE NO.D-G-7, GUIDE FOR WEET DOUGH MAKE-UP.
NOTE: 2. USE ABOUT 2 TBSP (1-NO. 30 SCOOP) APPLE PIE FILLING FOR EACH PASTRY.
Recipe Number: D00300
SERVING SIZE: 2 TABLESP
